config.wire-master.title: Wire Master configuration
config.wire-master.movement_type.tooltip: Changes how the player moves in wire designer mode
config.wire-master.transparent_players.t: Hide players in wire designer mode
config.wire-master.counter_strafing.tool: Stop moving immediately after pressing opposite direction key in wire designer mode
config.wire-master.max_speed.tooltip: Maximum flying speed in wire designer mode
config.wire-master.acceleration.tooltip: Acceleration of flying speed in wire designer mode
config.wire-master.slowdown.tooltip: Slowdown of flying speed in wire designer mode
config.wire-master.reach_distance.toolti: Is used if cursor mode is enabled, if it's too high you might get performance issues
